settings.title: Free Shipping on orders above $49
settings.content: All orders above $49 qualify for free and fast US shipping.

settings.title: Tchibo Classic Blend - Medium Roast
settings.content:
• Our Röstmeisters single roast these 100% Arabica beans to a bold medium roast with a powerful flavor
  • It has a satiny finish with rich, lively aromas of red berries and dried fruits
  • With very light acidity in taste to give a balance body
  • Blended of Rainforest Alliance Latin American coffees – originate of Brazil, Honduras, Columbia
  • Intensity level 4 out of 6
  • Recommended for Drip-Filter coffee, Pour over, French Press, Bean-to-Brew fresh grind coffee preparation
  • Kosher certified

settings.title: Tchibo Röstmeister - Dark Roast
settings.content:
• Our Röstmeisters single roast these 100% Arabica beans to a deep Espresso Style strong roast with intense flavor
  • Dark Roasted, strong aroma and exquisite bittersweet chocolate flavor
  • Blended of Rainforest Alliance Latin American coffees – originate of Columbia, Guatemala, Brazil
  • Intensity level 6 out of 6
  • Recommended for Espresso Coffees, milk-based coffee specialty beverages
  • Kosher certified
